name: PVC (rainbow edit)
description:
PVC (player vs computer) is a precision platformer that is randomly generated. 

All the assets are my own. Some of the assets were modified to fit the theme of a game jam.

Pretty much finished. I love feedback. (I had trouble building and uploading from unity, any suggestions?)

Inspiration for this game comes from Ultimate Chicken Horse and Give Up.

I have been working on this game for a while, hope you enjoy.
